decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed extensions, by reason of their combined siting, design and depth would result in an overly dominant and unsympathetic form of development that would fail to reflect the pattern of development to the detriment of the visual amenity of the locality.  The proposal would therefore fail to comply with, in particular, policies DMD2 and DM D3 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014 and Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021.

Reason : 2 - The proposed rear extensions, by reason of combined unacceptable siting, height and depth would result in an overbearing and visually intrusive form of development that would adversely impact on the residential amenity of nearby occupants, in particular, no.3 Hammond Avenue and potentially result in overshadowing. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policy DMD2 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014 and Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan 2021.

Reason : 3 - In the absence of a Flood Risk Assessment and Sustainable Drainage Strategy demonstrating the proposals would not result in increase in risk of flooding within the area of critical drainage in the locality the proposal would be contrary to, in particular, Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014 polices DM F1 and DM F2, Merton Core Strategy 2011 Policy CS16 and the Environmental Agency's Standing Advice.

Reason : 4 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
"	The application was not considered to comply with the provisions of the Development Plan and NPPF as submitted, and would have required substantial changes such that a new application would be required. 

"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.
description: ERECTION OF A SIDE/REAR EXTENSION AT GROUND FLOOR AND ROOF LEVEL AND TWO STOREY REAR EXTENSION.
